title: Oma's Caramel Apple Cake
markdown:
### Summary

Nathan,

Oma Dianne has some of the best recipes! When she decided to move from her home into assisted living she allowed me to have her recipe cards. I have not made all of them but I can almost guarantee they are the best. Just like you and your soon to be little brother. I love you dearly.

Mom

### Ingredients

* 1 ½ cup bisquick
* ⅔ cup sugar
* ½ cup milk
* 2 med apples, peeled and sliced (2 cups)
* 1 Tbs lemon juice
* 1 cup packed brown sugar
* 1 tsp ground cinnamon
* 1 cup boiling water
* Whipped cream or ice cream optional
### Preparation

* Preheat oven at 350
* Mix bisquick, water, and milk in a bowl
* Pour in ungreased square pan 9x9x2. 
* Top with apples mixed with lemon juice
* Stir together brown sugar and cinnamon, sprinkle over apples
* Bake 50-60 min or until center comes out clean
